articles.title: Articles
articles.description: Original budgeting, passive income, and savings content for educational purposes.

home.title: Home
home.subtitle: Financial Life Simulator is a financial simulation tool for individual users. Enter your savings, monthly expenses, and passive income, and the system will simulate future monthly financial changes based on configurable annual returns and random life events, providing quantified financial advice. This tool is for educational and planning purposes only and does not constitute investment advice.
home.complianceDesc: Clear data source labeling, privacy and disclaimer pages, more suitable for review and educational purposes.
home.visualizationDesc: Monthly balance, trends and structure charts displayed together to help build intuitive understanding of cash flow and risk.
home.realisticDesc: Fixed expenses, investment returns and random events are simulated in parallel, supporting different risk preference configurations.

calculator.title: Budget Calculator
calculator.annualReturn: Annual Return Rate (0-1, optional, enter 0 if not investing)
calculator.tip: Tip: After checking "Enable Random Events", the system will generate 0-3 income/expense/inflation events per month for simulation.

chat.description: Shows cumulative results based on monthly passive income, fixed expenses, investment returns and random events.

about.title: About Financial Life Simulator
about.intro1: Financial Life Simulator is a lightweight financial simulation tool for individual users.
about.intro2: You only need to enter basic data such as current savings, monthly expenses, and passive income, and the system will simulate your financial changes over the next few months based on configurable annual return rates and simulation events, helping you more intuitively understand your "supportable time".
about.philosophy1: In uncertain times, everyone needs a more transparent and direct understanding of their financial situation.
about.philosophy2: The goals of Financial Life Simulator are:
about.philosophy3: Let individuals quickly understand "If I resign, how long can I survive?"
about.philosophy4: Display cash flow changes in a simple and intuitive way
about.philosophy5: Help users make more rational and controllable life planning
about.philosophy6: Make financial thinking easier, no longer complicated
about.philosophy7: This tool does not provide investment advice, only a "life simulator" perspective.
about.feature1: Savings lifespan simulation: Calculate future financial changes based on your data
about.feature2: Adjustable parameters: Annual return rate, expenses, passive income, etc. are all configurable
about.feature3: Random event system: Introduce uncontrollable factors in life to make simulations more realistic
about.feature4: Chart visualization: Display asset change trends with curves
about.feature5: Result analysis: Provide you with simple, quantified reference suggestions
about.why1: Most people don't know how long they can support themselves, and can't intuitively feel the impact of certain spending habits.
about.why3: A tool that doesn't require financial knowledge to use
about.why5: No login or provision of any private data required
about.why6: A tool that allows people to instantly understand their financial health
about.limitation1: All results of Financial Life Simulator are based on model calculations and only represent a possible future scenario, and do not constitute any investment, financial or legal advice.
about.limitation2: Simulation results may be affected by parameter settings and model simplifications, and may differ from actual situations. Users should make their own judgments.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
Effective Date: November 13, 2025

Thank you for using this website (hereinafter referred to as "this website" or "we"). We highly value your privacy and data security. This privacy policy aims to explain how we collect, use, store and protect your information.

I. Information We Collect

During your use of this website, we do not collect any personally identifiable information (such as name, ID number, contact information, etc.).

We only collect the following non-personal information when you voluntarily fill it in, for calculating and simulating your financial situation:

Current savings amount

Monthly or daily expense amount

Monthly income or passive income (optional)

Investment return rate (optional)

All data is only used for financial simulation and result display in your current browsing session, and will not be permanently saved or transmitted to any third-party server.

II. How We Use Information

Your provided data is only used for the following purposes:

Calculate financial simulation results on the browser side (locally);

Display visualization results and financial trend predictions to you;

Improve website functionality and user experience (using only anonymous statistical data).

We will not use your input for advertising, user profiling, or sharing data with third parties.

III. Information Storage and Security

Your entered data is only temporarily stored in browser memory (or local cache) and will not be uploaded to the server.

Once you refresh or close the page, the data will be automatically cleared.

We do not establish any user accounts or data files.

IV. Third-Party Services

This website may use the following third-party services to improve performance or statistics:

Website hosting services (such as Vercel, Netlify or GitHub Pages);

Anonymous access analytics (such as Google Analytics, only recording visit counts and page views, not associated with personal data).

We only choose third-party services that meet data protection requirements and ensure they do not access your input data.

V. Your Rights

Since we do not collect or save personally identifiable data, you do not need to perform data deletion or export operations.

If you have any questions about privacy or data security, please contact us through the following methods.

VI. Contact Us

If you have any questions, suggestions or complaints about this privacy policy, please contact us:

üìß Contact Email: support@yourdomain.com

üåê Website: https://finlifesim.com

VII. Policy Updates

We may update this privacy policy from time to time. The updated version will be published on this page and will take effect immediately.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content:
Financial Life Simulator (hereinafter referred to as "this tool") is a financial simulation tool for individual users. Users input savings, monthly expenses, passive income and other optional parameters, and this tool will simulate future financial changes based on configurable annual return rates, random life events and simulation models. All output content of this tool, including but not limited to: simulation results, charts, suggestions, and analysis text, is for educational, experiential and planning reference only.

Please note:

This tool does not constitute any form of investment advice, financial advice or professional consulting services.

Simulation results are affected by model assumptions, set parameters, random events and calculation methods, and their accuracy, completeness or feasibility is not guaranteed.

This tool does not assume responsibility for any losses, risks or adverse consequences caused by using simulation results or relying on related content.

Users should make decisions carefully based on their own circumstances, and should consult qualified professional advisors or financial service institutions when necessary.

Using this tool means you understand and accept the above content.

If you do not agree with this disclaimer, please stop using this tool immediately.

footer.description: This tool is for educational and planning purposes only and does not constitute investment advice. Please consult professionals before making important financial decisions.
